Nossa missão: ensinar astronomia e astro: Our mission: to teach astronomy and astrophysics comprehensively, guiding students from the most basic to the most advanced level. Our purpose is to prepare teenagers fresh out of high school and adults of all ages to master knowledge of the universe, offering a real path to pursue outstanding careers in various fields of physics and space science.
Nossa visão: ser reconhecido nacional e: Our vision: to be recognized nationally and internationally as the most complete, accessible and inspiring astronomy and astrophysics course, present both online and in educational institutions. We want to be the starting point for great scientific careers, forming students who stand out in universities, research centers and space agencies around the world.
Nossos valores: acreditamos em um ensino: Our values: we believe in quality education, accessible to everyone, regardless of age or background. We value love for science, curiosity, respect for diversity and commitment to each student in their learning journey. Our content is based on reliable and updated sources, always with the goal of transforming lives through knowledge.
Você já olhou para o céu noturno e se pe: Have you ever looked at the night sky and wondered about the mysteries of the cosmos? At NEBULA, we are passionate about astronomy and astrophysics, and our mission is to transform that curiosity into deep knowledge.
Aulas gravadas com explicações didáticas: Recorded lessons with didactic explanations and commented exercises to guide you from basic to advanced in astronomy and astrophysics. Watch at your own pace, as many times as you want.
Conteúdo em PDF para quem prefere aprend: PDF content for those who prefer to learn by reading, plus structured tasks that are part of the learning schedule and reinforce each topic studied.
Tenha acesso a um fórum exclusivo com ou: Have access to an exclusive forum with other students and count on direct support from teachers to clear doubts and deepen your studies.
Cadastre-se gratuitamente e tenha acesso: Register for free and get immediate access to introductory course lessons. Discover how easy and engaging it is to start your journey through the universe!

ENCONTRE O MELHOR PLANO PARA VOCÊ: FIND THE BEST PLAN FOR YOU
Após assistir o vídeo acima e entender c: After watching the video above and understanding how our courses work, now you can choose the best plan for you.
Para iniciantes, aborda conceitos básico: For beginners, it covers basic physics and astronomy concepts, such as the Solar System and fundamental laws. Ideal for those starting their journey in the scientific universe.
Explora temas intermediários como leis d: Explores intermediate topics such as Newton's laws, stars, galaxies and introduction to relativity. Perfect for those who already know the basics and want to go deeper.
Plano avançado com conteúdos sobre físic: Advanced plan with content on quantum physics, black holes, dark energy and cosmology. Recommended for those seeking complete and in-depth training.
